## Slicing

```{r}
set.seed(49387)

dd <- tibble(
  ID = c(rbind(1:50, NA)),
  x = c(rbind(rnorm(50, mean = 10), NA)),
  Group = c(rbind(sample(LETTERS[1:5], size = 50, replace = TRUE), NA))
)

dd |> print(n = 100)
```


## `slice()` and `slice_head()`

```{r}
dd |> slice(1:5)
dd |> slice_head(n = 5)
dd |> slice_tail(n = 5)
dd |> slice_sample(n = 10)
```


## `slice()` can take a vector

```{r}
dd |> slice(c(1, 3, 5, 7, 9))
```

Make a sequence and slice with that sequence:

```{r}
rows_to_keep <- seq(1, nrow(dd), by = 2)
dd |> slice(rows_to_keep)

dd |> slice(seq(1, n(), by = 2))
```
